Text: ‘Surging input costs are keeping #farmers awake at night’: #Ifac Irish Farm Report 2022 https://t.co/XbElmpY8yh #agribusiness @ifac_ireland

@jerwaugh @youngsiward Would you not agree that if you owned a wind farm or a CCGT now you would be making massive profits because of the high wholesale prices and your low production cost? And that electricity consumers bear the costs of those super-profits?
@libraryturner @lidl_ireland Don’t get used to it. Costs are rising to much at an on farm level. It’s inevitable that prices in store will rise. @lidl_ireland know this.
